mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carte de la partie françoise de St. Domingue = A map of the French part of St. Domingo / faite par Bellin Ingr. de la Marine et depuis augmentée par P.C. Varlé et autres ingrs. ; J.T. Scott sculp., Philada
Map of the French part of St Domingo
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bellin, Jacques Nicolas, 1703-1772
Carey, Mathew, 1760-1839
Scott, J. T. (Joseph T.)
Varlé, P. C.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Relief shown pictorially; depths by soundings.
Shows classified towns, parishes, and "Places burnt by the Negroes ...," etc.
Shows the area at the time of the Haitian Revolution, before Toussaint L'Ouverture forced the Spanish to withdraw in July 1795.
Plate number "48" printed in upper left corner.
Appeared with plate number 48 in: Carey's general atlas ..., Philadelphia, Mathew Carey, 1811.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Defective at upper left corner, with loss of a small part of the title.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Haiti--Maps
Haiti--History--Revolution, 1791-1804--Maps
